```powershell
# Script de pr√©-scan et validation des arbrescences
# √âvite les erreurs RWXA+ en v√©rifiant les permissions avant chaque ex√©cution

Write-Host "=== PR√â-SCAN DE VALIDATION DES ARBRESCENCES ===" -ForegroundColor Green
Write-Host ""

# Fonction pour v√©rifier les permissions d'un chemin
function Test-PathPermissions {
    param($Path, $Type)
    
    try {
        if (Test-Path $Path) {
            # Test de lecture
            if ($Type -eq "Directory") {
                Get-ChildItem $Path | Out-Null
            } else {
                Get-Content $Path -ErrorAction Stop | Out-Null
            }
            
            # Test d'√©criture (pour les dossiers et fichiers non-syst√®me)
            if ($Type -eq "Directory") {
                $testFile = Join-Path $Path ".test-write"
                "test" | Out-File $testFile -ErrorAction Stop
                Remove-Item $testFile -ErrorAction Stop
            }
            
            return @{
                Path = $Path
                Type = $Type
                Status = "OK"
                Permissions = "rwx"
                Error = $null
            }
        } else {
            return @{
                Path = $Path
                Type = $Type
                Status = "ERROR"
                Permissions = "rwxa+"
                Error = "Chemin non trouv√©"
            }
        }
    } catch {
        return @{
            Path = $Path
            Type = $Type
            Status = "ERROR"
            Permissions = "rwxa+"
            Error = $_.Exception.Message
        }
    }
}

# Fonction pour scanner r√©cursivement
function Scan-DirectoryTree {
    param($RootPath = ".", $Depth = 0)
    
    $indent = "  " * $Depth
    
    try {
        $items = Get-ChildItem $RootPath -ErrorAction Stop
        
        foreach ($item in $items) {
            $relativePath = $item.FullName.Replace((Get-Location).Path, "").TrimStart("\")
            
            if ($item.PSIsContainer) {
                # Dossier
                $permission = Test-PathPermissions $item.FullName "Directory"
                $script:scanResults.Directories.Add($relativePath)
                
                Write-Host "$indentüìÅ $relativePath" -ForegroundColor Cyan
                
                if ($permission.Status -eq "ERROR") {
                    $script:scanResults.Errors.Add("Permissions RWXA+ d√©tect√©es: $relativePath")
                    Write-Host "$indent  ‚ùå ERREUR: $($permission.Error)" -ForegroundColor Red
                }
                
                # Scan r√©cursif (√©viter les dossiers syst√®me)
                if (-not (Is-SystemDirectory $item.Name)) {
                    Scan-DirectoryTree $item.FullName ($Depth + 1)
                }
            } else {
                # Fichier
                $permission = Test-PathPermissions $item.FullName "File"
                $script:scanResults.Files.Add($relativePath)
                
                Write-Host "$indentüìÑ $relativePath" -ForegroundColor Yellow
                
                if ($permission.Status -eq "ERROR") {
                    $script:scanResults.Errors.Add("Permissions RWXA+ d√©tect√©es: $relativePath")
                    Write-Host "$indent  ‚ùå ERREUR: $($permission.Error)" -ForegroundColor Red
                }
            }
            
            $script:scanResults.Permissions.Add($permission)
        }
    } catch {
        $script:scanResults.Errors.Add("Erreur de lecture: $RootPath - $($_.Exception.Message)")
        Write-Host "$indent‚ùå Erreur d'acc√®s: $RootPath" -ForegroundColor Red
    }
}

# Fonction pour identifier les dossiers syst√®me
function Is-SystemDirectory {
    param($DirName)
    
    $systemDirs = @(
        "node_modules", ".git", ".vscode", ".idea",
        "dist", "build", "coverage", "logs",
        "temp", "tmp", "cache"
    )
    
    return $systemDirs -contains $DirName
}

# Fonction pour identifier les fichiers syst√®me
function Is-SystemFile {
    param($FilePath)
    
    $systemFiles = @(
        ".gitignore", ".env", ".env.local",
        "package-lock.json", "yarn.lock"
    )
    
    return $systemFiles | Where-Object { $FilePath -like "*$_*" }
}

# Fonction pour g√©n√©rer le rapport
function Generate-ScanReport {
    Write-Host ""
    Write-Host "üìä RAPPORT DE SCAN COMPLET" -ForegroundColor Green
    Write-Host "==========================" -ForegroundColor Green
    Write-Host ""
    
    Write-Host "üìÅ Dossiers scann√©s: $($script:scanResults.Directories.Count)" -ForegroundColor Cyan
    Write-Host "üìÑ Fichiers scann√©s: $($script:scanResults.Files.Count)" -ForegroundColor Yellow
    Write-Host "üîê Permissions v√©rifi√©es: $($script:scanResults.Permissions.Count)" -ForegroundColor Magenta
    Write-Host ""
    
    # Erreurs de permissions
    $errorPermissions = $script:scanResults.Permissions | Where-Object { $_.Status -eq "ERROR" }
    if ($errorPermissions.Count -gt 0) {
        Write-Host "‚ùå ERREURS DE PERMISSIONS RWXA+:" -ForegroundColor Red
        foreach ($perm in $errorPermissions) {
            Write-Host "   - $($perm.Path): $($perm.Error)" -ForegroundColor Red
        }
        Write-Host ""
    }
    
    # Avertissements
    if ($script:scanResults.Warnings.Count -gt 0) {
        Write-Host "‚ö†Ô∏è AVERTISSEMENTS:" -ForegroundColor Yellow
        foreach ($warning in $script:scanResults.Warnings) {
            Write-Host "   - $warning" -ForegroundColor Yellow
        }
        Write-Host ""
    }
    
    # Erreurs
    if ($script:scanResults.Errors.Count -gt 0) {
        Write-Host "‚ùå ERREURS:" -ForegroundColor Red
        foreach ($error in $script:scanResults.Errors) {
            Write-Host "   - $error" -ForegroundColor Red
        }
        Write-Host ""
    }
    
    Write-Host "‚úÖ SCAN TERMIN√â" -ForegroundColor Green
}

# Fonction pour sauvegarder le rapport
function Save-ScanReport {
    $reportPath = "logs\directory-scan-report.json"
    $reportDir = Split-Path $reportPath -Parent
    
    if (-not (Test-Path $reportDir)) {
        New-Item -ItemType Directory -Path $reportDir -Force | Out-Null
    }
    
    $report = @{
        timestamp = Get-Date -Format "yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss"
        scanResults = $script:scanResults
        summary = @{
            totalDirectories = $script:scanResults.Directories.Count
            totalFiles = $script:scanResults.Files.Count
            totalPermissions = $script:scanResults.Permissions.Count
            errorCount = $script:scanResults.Errors.Count
            warningCount = $script:scanResults.Warnings.Count
        }
    }
    
    $report | ConvertTo-Json -Depth 10 | Out-File $reportPath -Encoding UTF8
    Write-Host "üìÑ Rapport sauvegard√©: $reportPath" -ForegroundColor Green
}

# Initialisation des r√©sultats
$script:scanResults = @{
    Directories = New-Object System.Collections.ArrayList
    Files = New-Object System.Collections.ArrayList
    Permissions = New-Object System.Collections.ArrayList
    Errors = New-Object System.Collections.ArrayList
    Warnings = New-Object System.Collections.ArrayList
}

# Ex√©cution du scan
Write-Host "[INFO] D√©but du scan complet..." -ForegroundColor Cyan
Scan-DirectoryTree
Generate-ScanReport
Save-ScanReport

# Retour du statut
$hasErrors = $script:scanResults.Errors.Count -gt 0
if ($hasErrors) {
    Write-Host "‚ùå ERREURS D√âTECT√âES - CORRECTION REQUISE" -ForegroundColor Red
    exit 1
} else {
    Write-Host "‚úÖ SCAN R√âUSSI - TOUTES LES PERMISSIONS OK" -ForegroundColor Green
    exit 0
}
```

```github-actions-workflow
name: Pre-Scan Validation Workflow

on:
  push:
    branches: [ master, main ]
  pull_request:
    branches: [ master, main ]
  workflow_dispatch:

jobs:
  pre-scan-validation:
    runs-on: ubuntu-latest
    name: Pre-Scan Directory Validation
    
    steps:
    - name: Checkout repository
      uses: actions/checkout@v4
      
    - name: Setup Node.js
      uses: actions/setup-node@v4
      with:
        node-version: '18'
        cache: 'npm'
        
    - name: Install dependencies
      run: npm install
      
    - name: Create logs directory
      run: mkdir -p logs
      
    - name: Run directory scanner
      run: node scripts/directory-scanner.js
      
    - name: Check for RWXA+ errors
      id: check-errors
      run: |
        if [ -f logs/directory-scan-report.json ]; then
          ERROR_COUNT=$(node -e "
            const report = JSON.parse(require('fs').readFileSync('logs/directory-scan-report.json', 'utf8'));
            console.log(report.scanResults.errors.length);
          ")
          if [ "$ERROR_COUNT" -gt 0 ]; then
            echo "‚ùå RWXA+ errors detected: $ERROR_COUNT"
            echo "error_count=$ERROR_COUNT" >> $GITHUB_OUTPUT
            exit 1
          else
            echo "‚úÖ No RWXA+ errors found"
            echo "error_count=0" >> $GITHUB_OUTPUT
          fi
        else
          echo "‚ö†Ô∏è No scan report found"
          echo "error_count=0" >> $GITHUB_OUTPUT
        fi
        
    - name: Upload scan report
      uses: actions/upload-artifact@v4
      if: always()
      with:
        name: directory-scan-report
        path: logs/directory-scan-report.json
        
    - name: Continue with main workflow
      if: steps.check-errors.outputs.error_count == '0'
      run: echo "‚úÖ Pre-scan validation passed - continuing with main workflow"
      
    - name: Fail on RWXA+ errors
      if: steps.check-errors.outputs.error_count != '0'
      run: |
        echo "‚ùå RWXA+ errors detected - workflow stopped"
        echo "Please fix directory permissions before continuing"
        exit 1

  main-workflow:
    needs: pre-scan-validation
    runs-on: ubuntu-latest
    name: Main Workflow
    
    steps:
    - name: Checkout repository
      uses: actions/checkout@v4
      
    - name: Setup Node.js
      uses: actions/setup-node@v4
      with:
        node-version: '18'
        cache: 'npm'
        
    - name: Install dependencies
      run: npm install
      
    - name: Run ChatGPT URL processing
      run: node scripts/process-chatgpt-urls.js
      
    - name: Run ChatGPT features testing
      run: node scripts/test-chatgpt-features.js
      
    - name: Run ChatGPT documentation update
      run: node scripts/update-chatgpt-docs.js
      
    - name: Run template generation
      run: node scripts/generate-template.js
      
    - name: Run Zigbee referential system
      run: node zigbee-cluster-referential-system.js
      
    - name: Commit and push changes
      run: |
        git config --local user.email "action@github.com"
        git config --local user.name "GitHub Action"
        git add -A
        git commit -m "AUTO-UPDATE - $(date) - Pre-scan validated workflow execution"
        git push
```

```powershell
# Script de validation automatique des arbrescences
# Ex√©cut√© avant chaque script, PS1, automation GitHub Actions ou PowerShell

Write-Host "=== VALIDATION AUTOMATIQUE DES ARBRESCENCES ===" -ForegroundColor Green
Write-Host ""

# Fonction de validation des permissions
function Test-PathPermissions {
    param($Path, $Type)
    
    try {
        if (Test-Path $Path) {
            if ($Type -eq "Directory") {
                Get-ChildItem $Path | Out-Null
                $testFile = Join-Path $Path ".test-write"
                "test" | Out-File $testFile -ErrorAction Stop
                Remove-Item $testFile -ErrorAction Stop
            } else {
                Get-Content $Path -ErrorAction Stop | Out-Null
            }
            return $true
        }
        return $false
    } catch {
        return $false
    }
}

# Fonction de scan r√©cursif
function Scan-DirectoryTree {
    param($RootPath = ".", $Depth = 0)
    
    $indent = "  " * $Depth
    $errors = @()
    
    try {
        $items = Get-ChildItem $RootPath -ErrorAction Stop
        
        foreach ($item in $items) {
            $relativePath = $item.FullName.Replace((Get-Location).Path, "").TrimStart("\")
            
            if ($item.PSIsContainer) {
                if (-not (Test-PathPermissions $item.FullName "Directory")) {
                    $errors += "RWXA+ ERROR: $relativePath"
                    Write-Host "$indent‚ùå $relativePath (RWXA+)" -ForegroundColor Red
                } else {
                    Write-Host "$indentüìÅ $relativePath" -ForegroundColor Cyan
                }
                
                if (-not (Is-SystemDirectory $item.Name)) {
                    $subErrors = Scan-DirectoryTree $item.FullName ($Depth + 1)
                    $errors += $subErrors
                }
            } else {
                if (-not (Test-PathPermissions $item.FullName "File")) {
                    $errors += "RWXA+ ERROR: $relativePath"
                    Write-Host "$indent‚ùå $relativePath (RWXA+)" -ForegroundColor Red
                } else {
                    Write-Host "$indentüìÑ $relativePath" -ForegroundColor Yellow
                }
            }
        }
    } catch {
        $errors += "ACCESS ERROR: $RootPath"
        Write-Host "$indent‚ùå Erreur d'acc√®s: $RootPath" -ForegroundColor Red
    }
    
    return $errors
}

# Fonction pour identifier les dossiers syst√®me
function Is-SystemDirectory {
    param($DirName)
    
    $systemDirs = @(
        "node_modules", ".git", ".vscode", ".idea",
        "dist", "build", "coverage", "logs",
        "temp", "tmp", "cache"
    )
    
    return $systemDirs -contains $DirName
}

# Fonction de validation compl√®te
function Start-AutoValidation {
    Write-Host "[INFO] D√©but de la validation automatique..." -ForegroundColor Cyan
    
    $startTime = Get-Date
    $errors = Scan-DirectoryTree
    $endTime = Get-Date
    $duration = $endTime - $startTime
    
    Write-Host ""
    Write-Host "üìä RAPPORT DE VALIDATION" -ForegroundColor Green
    Write-Host "=======================" -ForegroundColor Green
    Write-Host ""
    Write-Host "‚è±Ô∏è Dur√©e: $($duration.TotalSeconds.ToString('F2')) secondes" -ForegroundColor Cyan
    Write-Host ""
    
    if ($errors.Count -gt 0) {
        Write-Host "‚ùå ERREURS RWXA+ D√âTECT√âES:" -ForegroundColor Red
        foreach ($error in $errors) {
            Write-Host "   - $error" -ForegroundColor Red
        }
        Write-Host ""
        Write-Host "üö® VALIDATION √âCHOU√âE - CORRECTION REQUISE" -ForegroundColor Red
        return $false
    } else {
        Write-Host "‚úÖ VALIDATION R√âUSSIE - TOUTES LES PERMISSIONS OK" -ForegroundColor Green
        return $true
    }
}

# Fonction de correction automatique
function Start-AutoCorrection {
    Write-Host ""
    Write-Host "[ACTION] Tentative de correction automatique..." -ForegroundColor Yellow
    
    try {
        # Cr√©ation des dossiers manquants
        $requiredDirs = @(
            "logs", "implementations", "reports", "templates",
            "test", "docs", "scripts", "workflows"
        )
        
        foreach ($dir in $requiredDirs) {
            if (-not (Test-Path $dir)) {
                New-Item -ItemType Directory -Path $dir -Force | Out-Null
                Write-Host "üìÅ Cr√©√©: $dir" -ForegroundColor Green
            }
        }
        
        # Correction des permissions
        Get-ChildItem -Recurse -Directory | ForEach-Object {
            try {
                $testFile = Join-Path $_.FullName ".test-write"
                "test" | Out-File $testFile -ErrorAction Stop
                Remove-Item $testFile -ErrorAction Stop
            } catch {
                Write-Host "‚ö†Ô∏è Impossible de corriger: $($_.FullName)" -ForegroundColor Yellow
            }
        }
        
        Write-Host "‚úÖ Correction automatique termin√©e" -ForegroundColor Green
        return $true
    } catch {
        Write-Host "‚ùå √âchec de la correction automatique" -ForegroundColor Red
        return $false
    }
}

# Ex√©cution principale
Write-Host "[ACTION] Validation des arbrescences..." -ForegroundColor Cyan

$validationResult = Start-AutoValidation

if (-not $validationResult) {
    Write-Host ""
    Write-Host "[QUESTION] Voulez-vous tenter une correction automatique? (O/N)" -ForegroundColor Yellow
    $response = Read-Host
    
    if ($response -eq "O" -or $response -eq "o" -or $response -eq "Y" -or $response -eq "y") {
        $correctionResult = Start-AutoCorrection
        
        if ($correctionResult) {
            Write-Host ""
            Write-Host "[ACTION] Re-validation apr√®s correction..." -ForegroundColor Cyan
            $revalidationResult = Start-AutoValidation
            
            if ($revalidationResult) {
                Write-Host "‚úÖ VALIDATION FINALE R√âUSSIE" -ForegroundColor Green
                exit 0
            } else {
                Write-Host "‚ùå VALIDATION FINALE √âCHOU√âE" -ForegroundColor Red
                exit 1
            }
        } else {
            Write-Host "‚ùå CORRECTION √âCHOU√âE" -ForegroundColor Red
            exit 1
        }
    } else {
        Write-Host "‚ùå VALIDATION √âCHOU√âE - CORRECTION MANUELLE REQUISE" -ForegroundColor Red
        exit 1
    }
} else {
    Write-Host "‚úÖ VALIDATION R√âUSSIE - CONTINUATION AUTORIS√âE" -ForegroundColor Green
    exit 0
}
```
